#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1001];
int main()
{
    int i=3;
    arr[0]=1;
    arr[1]=1;
    arr[2]=1;
    while(i<1001)
    {
        arr[i]=0;
        int j=1;
        while(j<i)
        {
            arr[i]+=arr[j]*arr[i-j];
            arr[i]%=10000;
            j++;
        }
        i++;
    }
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%d\n",arr[n]);
    }
}
